scripts.sass:build: sass wwwroot/assets/scss/main.scss wwwroot/assets/css/main.css && sass wwwroot/assets/scss/spacing.scss wwwroot/assets/css/spacing.css && sass wwwroot/assets/scss/admin.scss wwwroot/assets/css/admin.css
scripts.sass:build:compressed: sass --style=compressed wwwroot/assets/scss/main.scss wwwroot/assets/css/main.css && sass --style=compressed wwwroot/assets/scss/spacing.scss wwwroot/assets/css/spacing.css && sass --style=compressed wwwroot/assets/scss/admin.scss wwwroot/assets/css/admin.css
